title: Getting Started

title: Authorization
desc: LiveChat uses the OAuth 2.1 protocol for authentication and authorization for all of its services.

items.desc: Learn about LiveChat Accounts, a service where you can configure options and resources common for all products.

items.desc: Learn how to use OAuth 2.1 to access LiveChat data in a secure way.

items.desc: Common problems and frequently asked questions about LiveChat authorization.

title: Messaging
desc: Build powerful integrations with the LiveChat Messaging APIs.

title: Reporting
desc: LiveChat Platform lets you extract data from all Reports available in LiveChat.
